primitiveValues.textValue: Mobile App Version External wallet AUT

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: Mobile App Version External wallet AUT

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
{!$Constants.Title}:

To withdraw cryptocurrency from your Ndax account using the mobile app, follow these steps:

  1. On the bottom navigation bar, tap the Ndax logo.
  2. Select Crypto.
  3. Choose the cryptocurrency you want to withdraw.
  4. Tap Withdraw on the bottom navigation bar.
  5. Select the network you want to use.
  6. Enter the amount you want to withdraw.
  7. Enter the destination wallet address where you want to send your cryptocurrency.
  8. If you are withdrawing XRP, XLM, EOS, LUNC, or Hedera, enter the required destination tag or memo ID.

⚠️ Important:
If a destination tag or memo is required, you must include it.
Failing to do so may result in a loss of funds or delays in processing your withdrawal.
Only check the ‘No Memo’ box if you are withdrawing to a private wallet that does not require one.
Most exchanges do require a destination tag or memo.

  1. Tap Confirm.
  2. Enter the six-digit 2FA code from your authentication app.
  3. Confirm the withdrawal by clicking the confirmation link sent to your email.
{!$Constants.Url}
